abilities.name: Shock Blast
abilities.effect: If Lt. Surge's Electrode is your Active Pokémon and gets damaged (even if it's Knocked Out), flip a coin. If tails, this power does 20 damage to each Active Pokémon. This power works even if Lt. Surge's Electrode is already Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed when it takes damage.

attacks.name: Power Ball
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.
